short_summary: Snow clearing and snow removal services for assigned governmental locations.
full_summary:
### Snow Clearing Tender Announcement

**Reference Number**: PW_HAL_413_11567

#### Tender Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, invites all interested suppliers to submit a proposal for a Snow Clearing contract.

**Trade Agreements and Regions**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

This contract will be conducted in accordance with the documents attached to the request for proposal. Suppliers are required to comply with all applicable legislation, regulations, and requirements.

**Tender Details**

* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Publication Date**: 2022-08-26
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-09-22T13:00:00
* **Last Amendment Date**: 2022-09-21

**Contract Specifications**

* **Services**: Snow clearing and removal
* **Locations**: 
    Bedford Institute of Oceanography, Dartmouth, NS
    Marine Communication Traffic Services, Shannon Hill, Dartmouth, NS
    Coast Guard Helicopter Hangar, Shearwater, NS
* **Contract Delivery Date**: Not specified

**Supplier Requirements**

All interested suppliers may submit a proposal. The selection of the contract will be based on the lowest price.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or comments related to this tender, please contact:

Castillo Nieto, Carlos
Phone: (782) 640-3162
Fax: (902) 496-5016
Email: Carlos.CastilloNieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Links to Documents

The Request for Proposal document and other relevant documents can be accessed here:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/09/9ea0e4450013498a5e9bb98434a0096f/ABES.PROD.PW_HAL.B413.E11567.EBSU001.PDF
